titleStmt.title: The 11th day of Aprill, 1653. A true report of the great costs and charges of the five hospitals in the City of London under the care of the lord mayor, commonalty and citizens of London in the maintaining of a very great number of poore the yeare last past.

notesStmt.note: A report on Christ's hospital, St. Bartholomew's, St. Thomas's, Bridewell, and Bethlem.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
